    • Method Detail

      • getData

        Data getData(long id)
      throws DaoException
        Load a persistently stored data block.
        Parameters:
        id - A unique identified of a previously stored data block.
        Returns:
        A loaded data block
        Throws:
        DaoException - If loading has failed

      • saveOrUpdateData

        void saveOrUpdateData(Data data)
               throws DaoException
        Persistently save a data block. Block's unique ID is available in the the data block itself. If a block with the same ID already exists, its persistent content should be updated.
        Parameters:
        data - A binary block to save or update
        Throws:
        DaoException - If save/update operation has failed

      • deleteData

        void deleteData(Data data)
         throws DaoException
        Delete a persistent data block. Normally, block's ID contained in the block itself if required to find and remove it.
        Parameters:
        data - A data block to delete, including its unique ID
        Throws:
        DaoException - If removal has failed

      • deleteData

        void deleteData(long dataId)
         throws DaoException
        Delete a persistent data block.
        Parameters:
        dataId - An ID of data block to delete
        Throws:
        DaoException - If removal has failed

      • getStatistics

        DataTable getStatistics()
        Returns usage statistics table.
